Sub ApplyOperation(ByVal rngAddress As String, ByVal sheetName As String, ByVal operation As String)

    Dim ws As Worksheet
    Set ws = ThisWorkbook.Sheets(sheetName)

    Dim rng As Range
    Set rng = ws.Range(rngAddress)

    Dim cell As Range
    For Each cell In rng.Cells
        If IsNumeric(cell.Value) And Not IsEmpty(cell.Value) Then

            Select Case LCase(operation)
                Case "add"
                    cell.Value = cell.Value + 1
                
                Case "subtract"
                    cell.Value = cell.Value - 1
                
                Case "multiply"
                    cell.Value = cell.Value * 2
                
                Case "divide"
                    If cell.Value <> 0 Then
                        cell.Value = cell.Value / 2
                    End If
                
                Case "clear"
                    cell.Value = ""
                
                Case Else
                    ' Unknown operator â†’ do nothing
            End Select

        End If
    Next cell

End Sub
